import { useState } from 'react'; export default function CanteenFormModal() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); return (

Hazard Table

{/* Add Button */}
{isOpen && (
{/* Original CanteenForm Content Goes Here */}
{/* SECTION 1: GENERAL INFORMATION */}

SECTION 1: GENERAL INFORMATION

CANTEEN INSPECTION FORM CONFIDENTIAL COMPLIANCE DOCUMENT

{/* Add all rows here exactly as you had them */} {/* SCHOOL NAME, LOCATION, DATE, etc... */}

SECTION 2: INSPECTION CHECKLIST

Legend: = Satisfactory = Needs Attention N/A = Not Applicable
Please comment where is marked.

A. KITCHEN AREA

{[ "Food preparation surfaces clean and sanitized.", "Handwashing facilities available and functional.", "Food stored at appropriate temperatures (refer from temp. Log sheets)", "Perishables stored off the floor and covered.", "Waste bins covered and emptied regularly.", "Pest control measures in place and effective.", "Refrigerators and freezers are functioning properly (refer to temp. Log sheets)", "Cooking equipment is clean and maintained", "Cleaning supplies stored separately from food items.", "Floor clean, dry, and slip-resistant", "No signs of pests (e.g., rodents, insects)" ].map((item, i) => ( ))}
Item / / N/A Comments
{item}
{/* SECTION 2: INSPECTION CHECKLIST */}

SECTION 2: INSPECTION CHECKLIST

Legend: = Satisfactory = Needs Attention N/A = Not Applicable
Please comment where is marked.

A. KITCHEN AREA

{/* You can paste your checklist map logic here */} {[ "Food preparation surfaces clean and sanitized.", "Handwashing facilities available and functional.", "Food stored at appropriate temperatures (refer from temp. Log sheets)", "Perishables stored off the floor and covered.", "Waste bins covered and emptied regularly.", "Pest control measures in place and effective.", "Refrigerators and freezers are functioning properly (refer to temp. Log sheets)", "Cooking equipment is clean and maintained", "Cleaning supplies stored separately from food items.", "Floor clean, dry, and slip-resistant", "No signs of pests (e.g., rodents, insects)" ].map((item, i) => ( ))}

B. SERVING AREA

Item / / N/A Comments
{item}
{[ "Serving counters clean and clutter-free", "Food handlers wear gloves/hairnets/aprons", "Hot food held at proper temperature (refer to temp. Log sheets)", "Cold food kept refrigerated or on ice", "Utensils and serving equipment clean", "Displayed food covered and protected", "Allergen information visibly posted" ].map((item, i) => ( ))}
Item / / N/A Comments
{item}

C. EATING AREA

{[ "Tables and chairs clean and undamaged", "Waste bins available and emptied frequently", "Floors swept/mopped regularly", "Adequate ventilation and lighting", "No signs of pests (e.g., rodents, insects)", "Hand sanitizer or wash station nearby" ].map((item, i) => ( ))}
Item / / N/A Comments
{item}

D. PERSONNEL & PROCEDURES

{[ "Canteen staff trained in food safety", "Staff wear clean uniforms/PPE", "Cleaning schedules followed and documented", "First aid kit available in canteen", "Emergency numbers posted in visible area" ].map((item, i) => ( ))}
Item / / N/A Comments
{item}

SECTION 4: ISSUES IDENTIFIED / ACTION PLAN

{Array(5).fill("").map((_, i) => ( ))}
Issue Corrective Action Person Responsible Due Date

SECTION 5: SIGN-OFF

{Array(2).fill("").map((_, i) => ( ))}
Inspector(s) Signature Date
)}
); }
